code: import _objectSpread from"C:/Users/soniy/Documents/oms-frontend_complete/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import React,{useState}from"react";import api from"../api/api";import"./AddProduct.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AddProduct(){const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:"",stock:0,price:0});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData(prev=>_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},prev),{},{[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await api.post("/products",formData);alert("✅ Product added successfully!");setFormData({name:"",stock:0,price:0});}catch(err){console.error("❌ Failed to add product:",err);alert("Something went wrong.");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Add New Product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"product-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Product Name:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",value:formData.name,required:true,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"e.g. Samsung Galaxy S23"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Stock Quantity:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"stock",value:formData.stock,required:true,onChange:handleChange,min:"1"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Price (\u20B9):",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"price",value:formData.price,required:true,onChange:handleChange,min:"1"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Product"})]})]});}export default AddProduct;
